replies.msg:
是咁的，小弟用緊MySQL做datasource
我嘅plan就係首先query->DataGridView
好似咁:
當我想改out_date嘅日期就打新嘅日子啦
但係問題係打完之後會出咗呢個dialog:

但係好奇怪地小弟已經做咗error handling，但係都係照出呢個dialog
請問有無高手幫小弟睇下點解會咁?
code:https://pastebin.com/0C3mGUBC

補充返小小 我個connection string
Public Sub connect()
        Dim DatabaseName As String = "test"
        Dim server As String = "127.0.0.1"
        Dim userName As String = "root"
        Dim password As String = "root"
        If Not conn Is Nothing Then conn.Close()
        conn.ConnectionString = String.Format("server={0}; user id={1}; password={2}; database={3}; pooling=false; Convert Zero Datetime=True; Allow Zero Datetime=True", server, userName, password, DatabaseName)
        Try
            conn.Open()
        Catch ex As Exception
            MsgBox(ex.Message)
        End Try
    End Sub

你個post名應該改少少
［VB#] —> [呼叫debugger;］
再頂 幫推

個error係咪before 你行個mysql_execute
9估： 個data table 唔可以將你改完個date time string 變 mysqldatetime

btw 行C# 啦
